solution_line_template: There are a total of {apples_per_box} apples/box x {num_boxes} boxes = <<{apples_per_box}*{num_boxes}={total_apples}>>{total_apples} apples in the {num_boxes} boxes.
So, Henry and his brother each have {total_apples} apples / {num_people} people = <<{total_apples}/{num_people}={apples_per_person}>>{apples_per_person} apples/person to consume.
Since there are {days_per_week} days in a week, thus, both of them can consume the {num_boxes} boxes of apples in {apples_per_person} / {days_per_week} = {weeks_to_consume} weeks.
